Package org.twelve.usecases.trade

Class TradeUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.usecases.trade.TradeRepository
      • org.twelve.usecases.trade.TradeUtility
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TradeManager
    public abstract class TradeUtility
extends TradeRepository
    Utility class for accessing certain types of trades and information on trades.
